game.name: Duckmageddon
game.description:
The best duck hunting challenge is here! Where are you boys? Join Duckmageddon and be prepared to participate in the biggest hunting competition! Grab your gun, kill all ducks that you see flying in the sky and prove yourself as the respected hunter of the city in this brand new action game! Hey! No chance to run out of ammo since you will be given unlimited chances to reload it. These birds have already entered your area so shoot them to teach a lesson.

There are multiple levels that will be represented through different days. And, in each level, you will be given particular targets to achieve. Make sure to shoot two types of birds to achieve your girl. Keep your eyes on ammo as well so that you can shoot enough of each one to finish each level in this HTML5 shooting game! Complete your targets fast to secure high points each time and show your insane shooter abilities to the world!

Do not miss it guys! You will be given a wonderful opportunity to become the part of a good-weather duck-hunting spree. Aim accurately and shoot as many as you can before they disappear from the screen in this cool shooter challenge! Remember the number of evasive ducks will keep increasing day by day. So do not forget to reload your gun to clear them all to save the local ecosystem from their unwanted rampage. Good luck to play this free action-packed challenge without download and relax your mind amazingly!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Duckmageddon at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
